MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the KA8 postcode area of Ayr affecting properties in Thoreyflat Drive and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers are on site and in order to carry out a repair on an underground cable located on Thorneytflat Drive, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.30am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.05am on Tuesday 26th January 2021.
